name: m5-pantilt
description: A firmware of M5Stack pantilt module

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp manifest*.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig
scripts.debug:linux: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r assets manifest*.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig -d -m -p lin
scripts.debug:m5stack: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r assets manifest*.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig -d -m -p esp32/m5stack
scripts.deploy:linux: npm run clean && tsc && cp manifest*.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig -m -p lin
scripts.deploy:m5stack: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r assets manifest*.json build/ && cd build && mcconfig -m -p esp32/m5stack
